name: insightful
description: I never percieved it in this way before, until today
mo-description: I was admiring the previous author's work on brocast when I realized that our brains have a similar system to pub/sub. As the night progressed, I understood that there is more than just a messaging system. this is my experiment to see if I can replicate some of the key attributes.

previously, I had also been admiring the code written in petkaantonov/FastEmitter and I noticed the whole domains bit, and led me to study those, why they are being removed from node, and it lead me to do a whole investigation on how our brains percieve errors. I hope I can explain it soon with the streams implementation.
author: Kenneth Bentley <mechanicofthesequence@gmail.com>

origin.name: brocast
origin.description: Abstract PubSub implementation. Extend this if you're implementing...
origin.author: ClickHere <js@clickhere.co.il>

origin.name: fastemitter
origin.description: A fast implementation of the node EventEmitter core module
